targets.query: select restart_count, "name" as "container",  "namespace", "pod_name" as pod, "node_name" as node from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[all_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[all_ns]]$/

select "policy", "alameda_scaler_name" as "alameda scaler", "name" as pod from alameda_cluster_status..pod where ("name" =~ /^[[all_pod]]$/ and "namespace" =~ /^[[all_ns]]$/) or ('Container' = '$resource' and scaling_tool= 'VPA')
select create_time *1000 , "name", node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, in_cluster from alameda_cluster_status..node

targets.expr: sum(1000 * max_over_time(namespace_pod_name_container_name:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$container_ns", namespace!="", pod_name="$pod", container_name="$container", pod_name!="", container_name!="POD"}[30s]))

targets.query:
select sum from 
(select sum(resource_limit_cpu) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and (("name" =~ /^[[app_container]]$/  and '$app_container' != '()') or ("name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/  and '$h_container' != '()') ) and ( ("pod_name" =~ /^[[deployment_pod]]$/ and '$deployment_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[statefulset_pod]]$/ and '$statefulset_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[deploymentConfig_pod]]$/ and '$deploymentConfig_pod' != '()') ) and "namespace" = '$ns'  and time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
(select sum(resource_limit_cpu) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "name" = '$container' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
(select sum from (select sum(resource_limit_cpu),count(resource_limit_cpu) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns' AND time>=now() and time <= now()+15m group by time($recomInterval) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0)

select sum from 
(select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and (("name" =~ /^[[app_container]]$/  and '$app_container' != '()') or ("name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/  and '$h_container' != '()') ) and ( ("pod_name" =~ /^[[deployment_pod]]$/ and '$deployment_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[statefulset_pod]]$/ and '$statefulset_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[deploymentConfig_pod]]$/ and '$deploymentConfig_pod' != '()') ) and "namespace" = '$ns'  and time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
(select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "name" = '$container' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
 (select sum from (select sum(resource_request_cpu ), count(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time>=now() and time <= now()+15m group by time($recomInterval) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0)

select * from
( select sum(value)from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 1h and time <= now() + 15m and namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 1h and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s))

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s))

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s))

select sum(max) from (select max(value) from alameda_metric..application_cpu where "name" = '$scaler' and "namespace" = '$ns' and $timeFilter and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)), (select max(value) from alameda_metric..container_cpu where "pod_name" = '$pod' and "pod_namespace" = '$ns' and "name" = '$container' and $timeFilter and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s)) where $timeFilter and time <= now() group by time(30s)

panels.title: CPU: Observation, Prediction, and Recommendation (in CPU milicore)

targets.query:
select sum from 
(select sum(resource_limit_memory) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and (("name" =~ /^[[memorys_app_container]]$/  and '$memorys_app_container' != '()') or ("name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/  and '$h_container' != '()') ) and (("pod_name" =~ /^[[memorys_deployment_pod]]$/ and '$memorys_deployment_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[memorys_statefulset_pod]]$/ and '$memorys_statefulset_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[memorys_deploymentConfig_pod]]$/ and '$memorys_deploymentConfig_pod' != '()')) 
 and "namespace" = '$ns'  and time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
(select sum(resource_limit_memory) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "name" = '$container' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
(select sum from (select sum(resource_limit_memory),count(resource_limit_memory) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns' and time>=now() and time <= now()+15m group by time($recomInterval) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0)

select sum from 
(select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and (("name" =~ /^[[memorys_app_container]]$/  and '$memorys_app_container' != '()') or ("name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/  and '$h_container' != '()') ) and (("pod_name" =~ /^[[memorys_deployment_pod]]$/ and '$memorys_deployment_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[memorys_statefulset_pod]]$/ and '$memorys_statefulset_pod' != '()') or ("pod_name" =~ /^[[memorys_deploymentConfig_pod]]$/ and '$memorys_deploymentConfig_pod' != '()')) 
 and "namespace" = '$ns'  and time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
(select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "name" = '$container' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time>=now()-1h and time < now() and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time($recomInterval)  fill(none)),
 (select sum from (select sum(resource_request_memory ), count(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_recommendation".."container" where granularity = '30' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'  and time>=now() and time <= now()+15m group by time($recomInterval) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0)

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() - 1h and time <= now() + 15m and namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() - 1h and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s))

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s))

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 15m and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s))

select sum(max) from (select max(value) from alameda_metric..application_memory where "name" = '$scaler' and "namespace" = '$ns' and $timeFilter and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(30s)), (select max(value) from alameda_metric..container_memory where "pod_name" = '$pod' and "pod_namespace" = '$ns' and "name" = '$container' and $timeFilter and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(30s)) where $timeFilter and time <= now() group by time(30s)

list.label: Scope
list.name: resource
list.query: Application, Container

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "namespace" where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA'
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "namespace" where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "alameda_scaler_name" where "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool= 'VPA'
list.label: Application
list.name: scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "alameda_scaler_name" where "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool= 'VPA'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[scaler]]$/ and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: Pod
list.name: pod
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[scaler]]$/ and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "pod_name" = '$pod'
list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "pod_name" = '$pod'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and  "name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1) order by time desc
list.label: pod
list.name: h_pod
list.query: select "name", "policy" from (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and  "name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1) order by time desc

list.definition: select "name", resource_limit_cpu from ( select "name", resource_limit_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "namespace" = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1), ( select "name", resource_limit_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "namespace" = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1) order by time desc
list.name: h_container
list.query: select "name", resource_limit_cpu from ( select "name", resource_limit_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "namespace" = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1), ( select "name", resource_limit_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "namespace" = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by "name" order by time desc limit 1) order by time desc

list.definition: select count("name") from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where namespace = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where namespace = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource'))
list.name: count_container
list.query: select count("name") from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where namespace = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where namespace = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource'))

list.definition: select preloader from alameda_metric..grafana_config order by time desc limit 1
list.label: Preloader
list.name: preloader
list.query: select preloader from alameda_metric..grafana_config order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "namespace" where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA'
list.name: all_ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "namespace" where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "alameda_scaler_name" where "namespace" =~ /^[[all_ns]]$/ and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA'
list.name: all_scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "alameda_scaler_name" where "namespace" =~ /^[[all_ns]]$/ and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "name" where "namespace" =~ /^[[all_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[all_scaler]]$/
list.name: all_pod
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "name" where "namespace" =~ /^[[all_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[all_scaler]]$/

list.definition: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA' and 'Application' = '$resource' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1
list.name: app_ns
list.query: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA' and 'Application' = '$resource' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Container' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1
list.name: container_ns
list.query: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'VPA' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Container' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader")
list.name: controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader")

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENT'
list.name: deployment_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENT'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG'
list.name: deploymentConfig_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'STATEFULSET'
list.name: statefulset_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'STATEFULSET'

list.name: app_container

list.name: memorys_statefulset_pod
list.query: label_values(container_memory_usage_bytes, pod_name)

list.definition: label_values(namespace_pod_name_container_name:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{pod_name=~ "[[deployment_pod]]|[[statefulset_pod]]|[[deploymentConfig_pod]]", container_name != "POD"}, container_name)
list.name: app_container
list.query: label_values(namespace_pod_name_container_name:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{pod_name=~ "[[deployment_pod]]|[[statefulset_pod]]|[[deploymentConfig_pod]]", container_name != "POD"}, container_name)

list.definition: label_values(container_memory_usage_bytes{pod_name=~ "[[memorys_deployment_pod]]|[[memorys_statefulset_pod]]|[[memorys_deploymentConfig_pod]]", container_name != "POD"}, container_name)
list.name: memorys_app_container
list.query: label_values(container_memory_usage_bytes{pod_name=~ "[[memorys_deployment_pod]]|[[memorys_statefulset_pod]]|[[memorys_deploymentConfig_pod]]", container_name != "POD"}, container_name)
